name: Concrete Hands Circuit
duration: 30s max rope slams → 30s dirty boxing combos → x5 rounds
notes: Ropes fatigue arms before punch output - mimics late-round flurries (95% effort)

name: Pavement Pounder
duration: 10 L/R hammer strikes → 5 tire flips → x5 rounds
notes: Transfers to hook power and mauling stamina (Max power)

name: Back-Alley Brawler
duration: 30s sandbag bear hug → 10 sprawls → x5 rounds
notes: Simulates clinch control and defensive urgency (Violent intent)

name: Ding-Dong Roundhouse
duration: 8 KB snatches → 10 band-resisted hooks → x5 rounds
notes: Snatches = uppercut transfer, bands simulate fatigue (Explosive)

name: Phone Booth Killer

notes: Jumps = explosive entries, push-ups = clinch framing (85% effort)
equipment_note: Bodyweight jumps only if no trap bar

name: Brick Fist Protocol

notes: Develops fight-ending straight right power (100% power)

name: Gutter War Special
duration: 20m sled push → 10 DB thruster punches → x5 rounds
notes: Pushes = ring-cutting, thrusters = combos under fatigue (Near-vomit)

name: Last Call Circuit
duration: 10 burpees → 10 sprawls → 10 jumping knees → x5 rounds
notes: Pure desperation conditioning for championship rounds (Survival mode)

name: Iron Chin Builder

name: Corner Beast Mode

notes: Simulates being against ropes and firing back (Fight night pace)

name: Blackout Blitz

name: Smashmouth Shovel Hook

name: Backfoot Butcher

name: Meat Locker

name: Glass Jaw Redemption

name: Alleyway Sprawl

name: Last Man Standing

name: Backyard Bouncer

name: Thai Clinch Crusher

notes: Swings mimic pull-down mechanics for knee strikes. Maintain upright Muay Thai posture. (85% effort)

name: Greco-Roman Grinder

name: Knee Executioner

notes: Trains cutting off space and striking in confined areas. Focus on framing and head position. (90% effort)

name: Reactive Sprawl Jumps
notes: Partner claps to signal sprawl. Max-height jump after.

name: Forward Lunge Strikes
notes: Lunge forward with lead hook. Reset completely.

name: Takedown-to-Knee Drill
notes: Double-leg takedown into standing knee strike. Reset.

name: Switch-Kick Plyos
notes: Simulate weight transfer for switch kicks.

name: BJJ Explosive Guard Pull
notes: Pull guard with immediate hip bump sweep attempt.

name: Dump Explosions
notes: Max-effort hip toss from clinch position.

name: Slip-Counter Springs
notes: Slip bag swing, then explode with 2-punch counter.

name: Cage-Push Escapes
notes: Explosive push-off from pinned cage position.

name: Liver Hook Bursts
notes: Max-power left hooks to liver region. Full reset.
equipment_note: Angle bag to mimic opponent stance.

name: Long Guard Snap
notes: Partner attempts clinch; fighter snaps long guard push.

name: Reshot Chains
notes: Initial shot > sprawl > immediate reshot. No pauses.

name: Axe Kick Acceleration
notes: Max-speed downward axe kicks. Full retraction.
equipment_note: Hang bag high for proper angle.

name: Swarm Entry Sprints
notes: Sprint into imaginary punching flurry. Reset completely.

name: Strike-to-Clinch Drill
notes: 3-punch combo > clinch entry. Explosive transitions.

name: Hip Slam Drill
notes: Max-power hip toss from double-collar tie.

name: Pull-Counter Springs
notes: Pull away from bag swing, explode back with cross.

name: Ground-and-Pound Bursts
notes: Short, violent elbow/hammerfist flurries from mount.

name: Corner Knee Bursts
notes: Max-power knees to trapped bag. Full hip extension.
equipment_note: Angle bag to simulate opponent lean.

name: Scrambler's Standup Explosions
notes: From bottom position, explode to feet in one motion.

name: Uppercut Barrage
notes: Max-power uppercuts from crouch position. Reset stance.

name: Spinning Back Kick Accelerations
notes: Full rotation back kicks with instant reset.

name: Long-Distance Shadowboxing
notes: Emphasize footwork and jab-cross out-fighting. (low-moderate)

name: Clinch Marching Rounds
notes: Maintain plum position while circling.

name: Grappler's Flow Roll
notes: No submissions - constant positional transitions.

name: Teep Maintenance Drill
notes: 1 teep every 5 seconds. Focus on reset speed.

name: Cage Cutting Footwork
notes: Practice cutting off octagon while shadowboxing.

name: Pummeling Endurance Rounds
notes: Hand-fighting only. No takedowns.

name: Kick Defense March
notes: Continuous check/block motions while circling. (low-moderate)

name: Brawler's Forward Shadow
notes: Aggressive forward movement with high guard.

name: Hybrid Stance Switch Drill
notes: Switch stances every 3 steps while navigating cones.

name: Thai Skip Rope
notes: Alternate foot every 10 jumps. Stay light. (low-moderate)

name: Octagon Footwork Gauntlet
notes: Touch all 8 cage sections in sequence.

name: Counter Striker's Retreat Drill
notes: Backstep while maintaining defensive shell.

name: Submission Hunter's Guard Retention
notes: Partner attempts passes while you maintain guard. (low-moderate)

name: Kicker's Range Management
notes: Maintain kicking range with constant teep feints.

name: Wrestler's Wall-Walk Drill
notes: From butt-scoot position, walk up wall to standing.

name: Pressure Fighter's Cutoff Circuit
notes: Mirror imaginary opponent while cutting off space.

name: Hybrid's Stance Transition Drill
notes: Switch between orthodox/southpaw every 5 steps. (low-moderate)

name: Clinch Fighter's Neck Endurance
notes: Maintain plum position against light resistance.

name: Scrambler's Turtle Recovery
notes: From turtle, stand up and circle out repeatedly.

name: Brawler's Body Shot Guard
notes: High guard while walking bag down with body shots.

name: Distance Striker's Angle Drill
notes: 45-degree steps off centerline between cones.

name: MMA Wall-Walk Conditioning
notes: Stand back up from seated position using cage.

name: Counter Striker's Parry Drill
notes: Parry bag strikes while maintaining distance.

name: Kicker's Switch Stance March
notes: Switch stances every 10 steps with teep feints. (low-moderate)

name: Grappler's Standup Chain
notes: From bottom, stand up and immediately sprawl.

name: Pressure Fighter's Cutoff Shadow
notes: Advance while cutting off angles in mirror.

name: Clinch Fighter's Frame Endurance
notes: Maintain frames against partner's forward pressure.

name: Hybrid's Transition Circuit
notes: Alternate between striking and shot feints.

name: Scrambler's Hip Escape Marathon
notes: Continuous hip escapes down mat length.

name: Distance Striker's Teep Maintenance
notes: 1 teep every 10 seconds. Reset completely.

name: Shadow Flow Rounds
notes: Emphasize footwork pivots and defensive slips between combos (60-70% effort)

name: Rope Clinch Frames
duration: 30s rope lean → 30s active framing → x8 rounds
notes: Simulates late-round clinch against ropes (RPE 5)

name: Referee Break Counters
duration: 10s clinch → 2s break → immediate jab → x20 rounds
notes: Trains quick strikes after forced breaks (50% speed)

name: Overhook Uppercut Drill
notes: Links framing to punch entries (40% power)

name: Corner Mauling Circuit
duration: 45s bag pinned to wall → 15s frame adjustments → x6 rounds
notes: Conditions forearm stamina for corner control (RPE 4)

name: Slip-Clinch Reaction
duration: Partner jabs → slip → clinch → x50 reps
notes: Drills clinch as defensive response (30% speed)

name: Reaction Jab Matrix
duration: 3min random ball toss → jab/parry response → x4 rounds
notes: Partner throws ball unpredictably; react with jab or parry (70% speed)

name: Clinch Auditory Triggers
duration: 5min clinch pummeling → change direction on beep → x3 rounds
notes: Pre-recorded beeps signal underhook/overhook switches (50% effort)

name: Wrestling Chess
duration: 3min live wrestling → 30s chess move → x5 rounds
notes: Alternate wrestling rounds with chess moves to drain mental stamina (60% effort)

name: Kick Pattern Recall
duration: 3min execute kick combos from flashed cards → x4 rounds
notes: Coach flashes card (e.g., '3-2-5'), fighter executes combo (40% power)

name: Takedown Dilemma
duration: 3min shot entries → cone color dictates finish (single/double) → x4 rounds
notes: Random cone colors force adaptive takedown chains (50% speed)

name: Brawler's Puzzle Defense
duration: 3min mitt work → solve 3 puzzle pieces between rounds → x5 rounds
notes: Disrupts rhythm to simulate in-fight chaos (60% power)

name: Distance Striker's Math Dodge
duration: 3min footwork drills → solve math problem between combos → x4 rounds
notes: Example: 'Teep → solve 7x8 → pivot' (50% effort)

name: Grappler's Blindfold Pummeling
notes: Forces reliance on grip/body feel over sight (30% effort)

name: Pressure Fighter's Shadowboxing Riddle
duration: 3min shadowboxing → answer riddle mid-round → x4 rounds
notes: Coach whispers riddles through earbuds (50% power)

name: Hybrid's Stance-Switch Reaction
duration: 3min light color dictates stance (red=orthodox/blue=southpaw) → x5 rounds
notes: Forces stance switches under fatigue (60% speed)
